turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good afternoon, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order an iced caffe mocha from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure which starbucks would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like any whipped cream or syrups?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like whipped cream. No syrups.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a venti, and for the milk, I want soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a venti iced caffe mocha with whipped cream and soy milk from the dallas galleria mall starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Your order will be ready in 15 minutes and you'll get the reciept via mobile.
